author: lifttrick
title: Bank Systems Using People
description: The problem I see facing crypto and humanity heading into this new era is one of Equality Vs Greed. We must find a balance.
solution: The current banking system is used to keep the people poor. I propose a new banking system that operates like a circle instead of a pyramid.
experience: I worked in a Company Oil Company in Marketing and IT for 8 years. I no longer work there because I automated my job.
